mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cardlist (p_id, u_id, title) VALUES (#{p_id}, #{u_id}, #{title})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.p_id, c.u_id, c.title, c.cdate, c.udate, c.ps_id FROM cardlist c JOIN project p ON c.p_id = p.id JOIN pcl_status ps ON c.ps_id = ps.id WHERE c.p_id = #{projectID} AND c.ps_id = 1 ORDER BY c.id DESC
